Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; just below rim, untidy zigzag pattern between pairs of bands in added white; below, elaborate rosette and lotus flower in white outline with added red centres; exterior: wide black band at rim with added red band; reserved below.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis) (on the evidence of being included in Petrie 1886, pl. V.)
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the decoration on the exterior, see British Museum 1924,1201.592 and Cambridge Museum of Classical Archaeology NA96.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. V, no. 4)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1966) (phase 2)
